metadata.title: How to Age Restrict YouTube Videos 2025: Content Ratings Guide
metadata.description: Understand YouTube age restrictions. When to restrict and how it affects your videos.

hero.headline: How to Age Restrict YouTube Videos
hero.subheadline: Understand content ratings. Protect your channel and young viewers.

sections.content: Age restriction limits videos to viewers 18+ and affects monetization, recommendations, and features. Understanding when restriction applies helps you make content decisions and protect your channel. Here's what creators need to know about YouTube's age restriction system.

content.title: Limited Reach
content.description: Not recommended, excluded from some features.

content.title: Reduced Monetization
content.description: Limited or no ads on restricted content.

content.title: Embedding Disabled
content.description: Can't be embedded on other sites.

content.title: Request Review
content.description: Appeal if you believe restriction is wrong.

content.title: Clear Violation
content.description: If borderline, YouTube may maintain restriction.

sections.title: Content Best Practices
content: When in doubt, play it safe

faq.question: Can I remove age restriction?
faq.answer: If YouTube applied it, appeal through Studio. If you self-applied, edit video settings to remove. YouTube-applied restrictions require review—success not guaranteed.

faq.question: Does age restriction affect monetization?
faq.answer: Significantly—many advertisers avoid restricted content. Revenue typically much lower. Some restricted content may not monetize at all. Consider if mature content is worth the trade-off.

faq.question: Why was my video age-restricted?
faq.answer: YouTube's system or reviewer flagged mature content. Check email for specifics. Common triggers: violence, adult themes, language, dangerous activities. Context matters but doesn't guarantee exemption.

faq.question: Should I self-restrict borderline content?
faq.answer: Sometimes strategic—protects channel from strikes. Shows good faith. However, limits reach significantly. Consider audience and content purpose. Alternative: edit content to avoid restriction entirely.
